medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ/epigastric pain accompanied by nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced 6 hours of RUQ/epigastric pain that returned last evening, severe in nature, with radiation to the right back. Symptoms also included nausea, multiple bouts of nonbloody, nonbilious emesis, chills, and loose, light-colored stools over the recent days. The patient reported a history of intermittent pain over months, with no pain-free periods noted between episodes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Seasonal allergies, allergy-induced asthma, rosacea, history of obstructing renal calculi s/p lithotripsy/stent placement, and cholelithiasis.
